channel.title: [PI]Cleint.jar: couldn't find find main class:client! Help?
channel.description: So when my friend try's to run my client.jar ( works fien on my computer) It says couldn't find main class: client. Program will exit... So what's the problem? I installed lower version of jdk(jdk6 update49) but he still gets the same error! I aleready rejarred it liek 30 times but still doesn't works. Can anybody fix my problem?

item.title: [PI]Cleint.jar: couldn't find find main class:client! Help?
item.dc:creator: @surer123 surer123
item.description:
@surer123 wrote:

I’ve fixed it myself… But fur all of you guys hwo have the same problem bdownload java jdk 6 update 21! Re-compile and re-jar. Enjoy your webclient

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Cleint.jar: couldn't find find main class:client! Help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“dannymoparscape, post:2, topic:520260”]667 + its Launcher.java
317 < load the good stuf[/quote]
You’re stupid. He’s using a PI. This means it’s most likely a refactored or renamed client.
That means the main class would be client.

OP: You’ve jarred it incorrectly.

Read full topic
